@graph.name: Roasted Vegetable Sandwich with Sun-Dried Tomato Spread
@graph.description: This ultimate vegan roasted vegetable sandwich packed with delicious grilled veggies and a quick homemade sun-dried tomato basil spread!

itemListElement.name: Roasted Vegetable Sandwich with Sun-Dried Tomato Basil Spread

@graph.name: Roasted Veggie Sandwich with Sun-Dried Tomato Basil Dressing
@graph.description: This ultimate vegan grilled vegetable sandwich is packed with delicious grilled veggies and features a quick homemade sun-dried tomato basil spread! This Summer sandwich bursts with goodness at every layer.  Make it for lunch or bring to a picnic. Nutfree and Soyfree
recipeIngredient: 1  long or large eggplant  (sliced into 1/4-inch thick slices)
1/2  red onion  (sliced into 1/8 inch thick slices or into 1/4-inch thick wedges)
1  red bell pepper ( sliced into 1/4-inch thick slices)

recipeInstructions.text: Prep your grill pan or the outdoor grill.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep your grill pan or the outdoor grill.

recipeInstructions.text: Once hot, brush the grill pan with oil then place the sliced vegetables on the pan. Brush some oil on the veggies. Sprinkle a little bit of salt and pepper and cook.
recipeInstructions.name: Once hot, brush the grill pan with oil then place the sliced vegetables on the pan. Brush some oil on the veggies. Sprinkle a little bit of salt and pepper and cook.

recipeInstructions.text: Press the veggies occasionally. You can use a spatula to press these vegetables down or use heavy grill weight. You can use skewers or toothpicks to keep the onion together
recipeInstructions.name: Press the veggies occasionally. You can use a spatula to press these vegetables down or use heavy grill weight. You can use skewers or toothpicks to keep the onion together

recipeInstructions.text: Cook until the vegetables have good golden brown stripes on them. Flip and continue to cook.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook until the vegetables have good golden brown stripes on them. Flip and continue to cook.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, make the sun dried tomato  spread: Add everything to the blender and a 1/4 cup of water and blend.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, make the sun dried tomato  spread: Add everything to the blender and a 1/4 cup of water and blend.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the mixture sit for 2-3 minutes then blend again and then add water, 1 tablespoon at a time until the mixture is a spreadable consistency. Taste and adjust salt and flavor.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the mixture sit for 2-3 minutes then blend again and then add water, 1 tablespoon at a time until the mixture is a spreadable consistency. Taste and adjust salt and flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: Toast your bread slices. Apply the spread on both of the slices. Then top the grilled vegetables on top of the one slice then place another slice on top and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Toast your bread slices. Apply the spread on both of the slices. Then top the grilled vegetables on top of the one slice then place another slice on top and serve.

@graph.keywords: grilled vegetable sandwich, sandwich with vegetables
